title: Emerald Polki Jadau Choker - 'Pachala Vaddanam'
features: Exquisite Jadau setting showcasing the brilliance of uncut Polki diamonds, meticulously handcrafted with traditional 'nakshi' work detailing. The central emerald is surrounded by a halo of polki diamonds, forming an intricate floral motif. Features a multi-strand necklace of emerald beads interspersed with lustrous freshwater pearls. Finished with delicate pearl drops (Gundlu) along the bottom edge.
colors: and golden yellow (gold). The contrast between the rich emeralds and the sparkling diamonds creates a visually stunning effect.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranti
and other special celebrations where a touch of regal elegance is desired.
description: This handcrafted Jadau Choker represents the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The use of natural polki diamonds and a stunning emerald centerpiece ensures that this piece is a unique heirloom that will be cherished for generations. The combination of traditional techniques and modern design makes it a versatile piece that can be worn with both traditional and contemporary outfits. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, adding to its overall allure.
